00145 UINT32 MainGameScreenInit(void)
00146 {  
00147       VIDEO_OVERLAY_DESC            VideoOverlayDesc;
00148 
00149 /*  If any 1 have time please calculate how big this buffer should be
00150  *  any questions? joker
00151  */
00152       gpZBuffer=InitZBuffer( 2048, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
00153       InitializeBackgroundRects();
00154 
00155       //EnvSetTimeInHours(ENV_TIME_12);
00156 
00157       SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
00158 
00159       // Init Video Overlays
00160       // FIRST, FRAMERATE
00161       VideoOverlayDesc.sLeft               = 0;
00162       VideoOverlayDesc.sTop                      = 0;
00163       VideoOverlayDesc.uiFontID    = SMALLFONT1;
00164       VideoOverlayDesc.ubFontBack  = FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK ;
00165       VideoOverlayDesc.ubFontFore  = FONT_MCOLOR_DKGRAY ;
00166       VideoOverlayDesc.sX                              = VideoOverlayDesc.sLeft;
00167       VideoOverlayDesc.sY                              = VideoOverlayDesc.sTop;
00168       swprintf( (wchar_t *)VideoOverlayDesc.pzText, (wchar_t *)L"90" );
00169       VideoOverlayDesc.BltCallback = BlitMFont;
00170       giFPSOverlay =  RegisterVideoOverlay( ( VOVERLAY_STARTDISABLED | VOVERLAY_DIRTYBYTEXT ), &VideoOverlayDesc );
00171 
00172       // SECOND, PERIOD COUNTER
00173       VideoOverlayDesc.sLeft               = 30;
00174       VideoOverlayDesc.sTop                      = 0;
00175       VideoOverlayDesc.sX                              = VideoOverlayDesc.sLeft;
00176       VideoOverlayDesc.sY                              = VideoOverlayDesc.sTop;
00177       swprintf( (wchar_t *)VideoOverlayDesc.pzText, (wchar_t *)L"Levelnodes: 100000" );
00178       VideoOverlayDesc.BltCallback = BlitMFont;
00179       giCounterPeriodOverlay =  RegisterVideoOverlay( ( VOVERLAY_STARTDISABLED | VOVERLAY_DIRTYBYTEXT ), &VideoOverlayDesc );
00180   
00181       // register debug topics
00182       RegisterJA2DebugTopic( TOPIC_JA2, "Reg JA2 Debug" );
00183   // MarkNote
00184   
00185   return TRUE;
00186 }

00190 // The ShutdownGame function will free up/undo all things that were started in InitializeGame()
00191 // It will also be responsible to making sure that all Gaming Engine tasks exit properly

00193 UINT32 MainGameScreenShutdown(void)
00194 { 
00195       ShutdownZBuffer(gpZBuffer);
00196       ShutdownBackgroundRects();
00197 
00198       // Remove video Overlays
00199       RemoveVideoOverlay( giFPSOverlay );
00200 
00201 
00202       return TRUE;
00203 }

00218 void EnterTacticalScreen( )
00219 {
00220       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen"));
00221       guiTacticalLeaveScreen = FALSE;
00222 
00223       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen: setpositionsndsactive"));
00224   SetPositionSndsActive( );
00225 
00226       // Set pending screen
00227       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen: setpendingnewscreen"));
00228       SetPendingNewScreen( GAME_SCREEN );
00229 
00230       // Set as active...
00231       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= ACTIVE;
00232 
00233       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
00234 
00235       //Disable all faces
00236       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen: setallautofacesinactive"));
00237       SetAllAutoFacesInactive( );
00238 
00239       // CHECK IF OURGUY IS NOW OFF DUTY
00240       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
00241       {
00242             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen: check our guy"));
00243             if ( !OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] ) )
00244             {
00245                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen: SelectNextAvailSoldier, merc not controllable"));
00246                   SelectNextAvailSoldier( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] );
00247             }
00248             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen: who is selected? %d", gusSelectedSoldier));
00249             // ATE: If the current guy is sleeping, change....
00250             if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->fMercAsleep )
00251             {
00252                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen: SelectNextAvailSoldier, merc asleep"));
00253                   SelectNextAvailSoldier( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] );               
00254             }
00255       }
00256       else
00257       {
00258             // otherwise, make sure interface is team panel...
00259             SetCurrentInterfacePanel( (UINT8)TEAM_PANEL );
00260       }
00261 
00262   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen:enable viewport region"));
00263       if( !gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive )
00264       {
00265             MSYS_EnableRegion(&gRadarRegion);
00266       }
00267   MSYS_EnableRegion( &gViewportRegion );
00268 
00269       // set default squad on sector entry
00270       // ATE: moved these 2 call after initalizing the interface!
00271       //SetDefaultSquadOnSectorEntry( FALSE );
00272       //ExamineCurrentSquadLights( );
00273 
00274       //UpdateMercsInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00275 
00276       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen: Init Interface"));
00277 
00278       // Init interface ( ALWAYS TO TEAM PANEL.  DEF changed it to go back to the previous panel )
00279       if( !gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive )
00280       {
00281             //make sure the gsCurInterfacePanel is valid
00282             if( gsCurInterfacePanel < 0 || gsCurInterfacePanel >= NUM_UI_PANELS )
00283                   gsCurInterfacePanel = TEAM_PANEL;
00284 
00285             SetCurrentInterfacePanel( (UINT8)gsCurInterfacePanel );
00286       }
00287 
00288       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen: settacticalinterfaceflags"));
00289       SetTacticalInterfaceFlags( 0 );
00290 
00291       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen: set default squad on sector entry"));
00292       // set default squad on sector entry
00293       SetDefaultSquadOnSectorEntry( FALSE );
00294       ExamineCurrentSquadLights( );
00295 
00296  
00297 
00298       fFirstTimeInGameScreen = FALSE;
00299 
00300       // Make sure it gets re-created....
00301       DirtyTopMessage( );
00302 
00303       // Set compression to normal!
00304       //SetGameTimeCompressionLevel( TIME_COMPRESS_X1 );
00305 
00306       // Select current guy...
00307       //gfGameScreenLocateToSoldier = TRUE;
00308 
00309       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen: check meanwhile"));
00310       // Locate if in meanwhile...
00311       if ( AreInMeanwhile( ) )
00312       {
00313             LocateToMeanwhileCharacter( );
00314       }
00315 
00316       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & IN_DEIDRANNA_ENDGAME )
00317       {
00318             InternalLocateGridNo( 4561, TRUE );
00319       }
00320 
00321       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen: clear messages"));
00322   // Clear tactical message q
00323       ClearTacticalMessageQueue( );
00324 
00325       // ATE: Enable messages again...
00326       EnableScrollMessages( );
00327 
00328       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterTacticalScreen: done"));
00329 
00330 }

00338 
00339 void InternalLeaveTacticalScreen( UINT32 uiNewScreen )
00340 {
00341   gpCustomizableTimerCallback = NULL;
00342 
00343       // unload the sector they teleported out of
00344   if ( !gfAutomaticallyStartAutoResolve )
00345   {
00346         CheckAndHandleUnloadingOfCurrentWorld();
00347   }
00348 
00349   SetPositionSndsInActive( );
00350 
00351       // Turn off active flag
00352       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ( ~ACTIVE );
00353 
00354       fFirstTimeInGameScreen = TRUE;
00355 
00356       SetPendingNewScreen( uiNewScreen );
00357 
00358       //Disable all faces
00359       SetAllAutoFacesInactive( );
00360       
00361       ResetInterfaceAndUI( );
00362 
00363       // Remove cursor and reset height....
00364       gsGlobalCursorYOffset = 0;
00365       SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
00366       
00367       // Shutdown panel
00368       ShutdownCurrentPanel( );
00369 
00370       //disable the radar map
00371       MSYS_DisableRegion(&gRadarRegion);
00372   //MSYS_DisableRegion( &gViewportRegion );
00373 
00374       // We are leaving... turn off pedning autobadage...
00375       SetAutoBandagePending( FALSE );
00376 
00377       // ATE: Disable messages....
00378       DisableScrollMessages( );
00379 
00380       
00381       if ( uiNewScreen == MAINMENU_SCREEN )
00382       {
00383             //We want to reinitialize the game
00384             ReStartingGame();
00385       }
00386 
00387       if ( uiNewScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
00388       {
00389             StopAnyCurrentlyTalkingSpeech( );
00390       }
00391 
00392       // If we have some disabled screens up.....remove...
00393       CheckForDisabledRegionRemove( );
00394 
00395       // ATE: Record last time we were in tactical....
00396       gTacticalStatus.uiTimeSinceLastInTactical = GetWorldTotalMin( );
00397 
00398       FinishAnySkullPanelAnimations( );
00399 }

00409 UINT32  MainGameScreenHandle(void)
00410 {
00411       UINT32            uiNewScreen = GAME_SCREEN;

00419       {
00420             // handle the help screen
00421             HelpScreenHandler();
00422             return( GAME_SCREEN ); 
00423       }
00424 
00425 
00426       
00427 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00428       DebugValidateSoldierData( );
00429 #endif
00430 
00431       if ( HandleAutoBandage( ) )
00432       {
00433             #ifndef VISIBLE_AUTO_BANDAGE
00434                   return( GAME_SCREEN );
00435             #endif
00436       }
00437 
00438 #if 0
00439       {
00440             PTR pData, pDestBuf;
00441             UINT32 uiPitch, uiDestPitchBYTES;
00442 
00443             pData = LockMouseBuffer( &uiPitch );
00444 
00445             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00446 
00447             Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00448                               (UINT16 *)pData, uiPitch,  
00449                               0 , 0, 
00450                               0 , 0, 
00451                               64, 64 );
00452 
00453             UnlockMouseBuffer( );
00454             UnLockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER);
00455             InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, 64, 64 );
00456 
00457             //mprintf( 0, 55, L"W: %dH: %d", gsCurMouseWidth, gsCurMouseHeight );
00458       }
00459 #endif
00460 
00461       if ( gfBeginEndTurn )
00462       {
00463             UIHandleEndTurn( NULL );
00464             gfBeginEndTurn = FALSE;
00465       }
00466 
00467 /*
00468       if ( gfExitToNewSector )
00469       {
00470             // Shade screen one frame
00471             if ( gfExitToNewSector == 1 )
00472             {
00473                   // Disable any saved regions!
00474                   EmptyBackgroundRects( );
00475 
00476                   // Remove cursor
00477                   uiOldMouseCursor = gViewportRegion.Cursor;
00478                   SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
00479 
00480                   //Shadow area
00481                   ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, 640, 480 );           
00482                   InvalidateScreen( );
00483 
00484                   // Next frame please
00485                   gfExitToNewSector++;
00486 
00487                   return( GAME_SCREEN );
00488             }
00489             else
00490             {
00491                   // Go into sector
00492                   JumpIntoAdjacentSector( gubNewSectorExitDirection );
00493                   gfExitToNewSector = FALSE;
00494 
00495                   // Restore mouse
00496                   SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( uiOldMouseCursor );
00497             }
00498       }
00499 */
00500 
00501 
00502       // The gfFailedToSaveGameWhenInsideAMessageBox flag will only be set at this point if the game fails to save during 
00503       // a quick save and when the game was already in a message box.
00504       //If the game failed to save when in a message box, pop up a message box stating an error occured
00505       if( gfFailedToSaveGameWhenInsideAMessageBox )
00506       {
00507             gfFailedToSaveGameWhenInsideAMessageBox = FALSE;
00508 
00509             DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zSaveLoadText[SLG_SAVE_GAME_ERROR], GAME_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
00510 
00511             return( GAME_SCREEN );
00512       }
00513 
00514 
00515       // Check if we are in bar animation...
00516       if ( InTopMessageBarAnimation( ) )
00517       {
00518             ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue( );
00519 
00520             EndFrameBufferRender( );
00521       
00522             return( GAME_SCREEN );
00523       }
00524 
00525       if ( gfTacticalIsModal )
00526       {
00527             if ( gfTacticalIsModal == 1 )
00528             {
00529                   gfTacticalIsModal++;
00530             }
00531             else
00532             {
00533                   HandleModalTactical( );
00534 
00535                   return( GAME_SCREEN );
00536             }
00537       }
00538 
00539       // OK, this is the pause system for when we see a guy...
00540       if ( !ARE_IN_FADE_IN( ) )
00541       {
00542             if ( gTacticalStatus.fEnemySightingOnTheirTurn )
00543             {
00544                   if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - gTacticalStatus.uiTimeSinceDemoOn ) > 3000 )
00545                   {
00546                         if ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam != gbPlayerNum )
00547                         {
00548                               AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( MercPtrs[ gTacticalStatus.ubEnemySightingOnTheirTurnEnemyID ], FALSE );
00549                         }
00550                         MercPtrs[ gTacticalStatus.ubEnemySightingOnTheirTurnEnemyID ]->fPauseAllAnimation = FALSE;
00551 
00552                         gTacticalStatus.fEnemySightingOnTheirTurn = FALSE;
00553                   }
00554             }
00555       }
00556 
00557       // see if the helicopter is coming in this time for the initial entrance by the mercs
00558       InitHelicopterEntranceByMercs( );
00559 
00560       // Handle Environment controller here
00561       EnvironmentController( TRUE );
00562 
00563       if ( !ARE_IN_FADE_IN( ) )
00564       {
00565             HandleWaitTimerForNPCTrigger( );
00566 
00567             // Check timer that could have been set to do anything
00568             CheckCustomizableTimer();
00569 
00570             // HAndle physics engine
00571             SimulateWorld( );
00572 
00573             // Handle strategic engine
00574             HandleStrategicTurn( );
00575       }
00576 
00577       if ( gfTacticalDoHeliRun )
00578       {
00579             gfGameScreenLocateToSoldier = FALSE;
00580             InternalLocateGridNo( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo, TRUE );
00581 
00582             // Start heli Run...
00583             StartHelicopterRun( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo );
00584 
00585             // Update clock by one so that our DidGameJustStatrt() returns now false for things like LAPTOP, etc...
00586             SetGameTimeCompressionLevel( TIME_COMPRESS_X1 );
00587             //UpdateClock( 1 );
00588 
00589             gfTacticalDoHeliRun = FALSE;
00590             //SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_NOTHING );
00591       }
00592 
00593 
00594       if ( InOverheadMap( ) )
00595       {
00596             HandleOverheadMap( );
00597             return( GAME_SCREEN );
00598       }
00599 /*
00600       if ( !ARE_IN_FADE_IN( ) )
00601       {
00602             HandleAirRaid( );
00603       }
00604 */
00605       if ( gfGameScreenLocateToSoldier )
00606       {
00607             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("maingamescreenhandle: tacticalscreenlocatetosoldier"));
00608             TacticalScreenLocateToSoldier( );
00609             gfGameScreenLocateToSoldier = FALSE;
00610       }
00611 
00612       if ( fFirstTimeInGameScreen )
00613       {
00614             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("maingamescreenhandle: entertacticalscreen"));
00615             EnterTacticalScreen( );
00616 
00617             // Select a guy if he hasn;'
00618             if( !gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive )
00619             {
00620                   if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] ) )
00621                   {
00622                         DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("maingamescreenhandle: selectsoldier"));
00623                         SelectSoldier( gusSelectedSoldier, FALSE, TRUE );
00624                   }
00625             }
00626       }
00627 
00628       // ATE: check that this flag is not set.... display message if so
00629       if ( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN )
00630       {
00631             // Unset
00632             guiTacticalInterfaceFlags &= (~INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN );
00633 
00634             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00635                   ScreenMsg( FONT_ORANGE, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"MAPSCREEN_INTERFACE flag set: Please remember how you entered Tactical." );
00636             #endif
00637       }
00638  
00639       if ( HandleFadeOutCallback( ) )
00640       {
00641             return( GAME_SCREEN );
00642       }
00643 
00644       if ( guiCurrentScreen != MSG_BOX_SCREEN )
00645       {
00646             if ( HandleBeginFadeOut( GAME_SCREEN ) )
00647             {
00648                   return( GAME_SCREEN );
00649             }
00650       }
00651 
00652 
00653       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00654             if( gfDoDialogOnceGameScreenFadesIn )
00655             {
00656                   ValidateSoldierInitLinks( 4 );
00657             }
00658       #endif
00659 
00660       HandleHeliDrop( );
00661 
00662       if ( !ARE_IN_FADE_IN( ) )
00663   {
00664         HandleAutoBandagePending( );
00665   }
00666 
00667 
00668       // ATE: CHRIS_C LOOK HERE FOR GETTING AI CONSTANTLY GOING
00669       //if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED )
00670       //{
00671       //    if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENEMYS_TURN) )
00672       //    {
00673       //          EndTurn( );
00674       //    }
00675       //}
00676 
00677 
00678 //    if ( gfScrollInertia == FALSE )
00679       {
00680             if ( !ARE_IN_FADE_IN( ) )
00681             {
00682                   UpdateBullets( );
00683 
00684                   // Execute Tactical Overhead
00685                   ExecuteOverhead( );
00686             }
00687 
00688             // Handle animated cursors
00689             if( gfWorldLoaded )
00690             {
00691                   HandleAnimatedCursors( );
00692 
00693                   // Handle Interface
00694                   uiNewScreen = HandleTacticalUI( );
00695 
00696                   
00697                   // called to handle things like face panels changeing due to team panel, squad changes, etc
00698                   // To be done AFTER HandleUI and before ExecuteOverlays( )
00699                   HandleDialogueUIAdjustments( );
00700 
00701                   HandleTalkingAutoFaces( );
00702             }
00703             #ifdef JA2EDITOR
00704             else if( gfIntendOnEnteringEditor )
00705             {
00706                   OutputDebugString( "Aborting normal game mode and entering editor mode...\n" );
00707                   SetPendingNewScreen( 0xffff ); //NO_SCREEN
00708                   return EDIT_SCREEN;
00709             }
00710             #endif
00711             else if( !gfEnteringMapScreen )
00712             {
00713                   gfEnteringMapScreen = TRUE;
00714             }
00715 
00716             if ( uiNewScreen != GAME_SCREEN )
00717             {
00718                   return( uiNewScreen );
00719             }
00720 
00721             // Deque all game events
00722             if ( !ARE_IN_FADE_IN( ) )
00723             {
00724                   DequeAllGameEvents( TRUE );
00725             }
00726       }
00727 
00728 
00729       
00730       /////////////////////////////////////////////////////                         
00731       StartFrameBufferRender( );
00732 
00733       HandleTopMessages( );
00734 
00735       if ( gfScrollPending || gfScrollInertia )
00736       { 
00737       }
00738       else
00739       {
00740             // Handle Interface Stuff
00741             SetUpInterface( );
00742             HandleTacticalPanelSwitch( );
00743       }
00744 
00745       // Handle Scroll Of World
00746       ScrollWorld( );
00747 
00748       //SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00749 
00750       RenderWorld( );
00751 
00752       if ( gRenderOverride != NULL )
00753       {
00754             gRenderOverride( );
00755       }
00756 
00757       if ( gfScrollPending || gfScrollInertia )
00758       {
00759             RenderTacticalInterfaceWhileScrolling( );
00760       }
00761       else
00762       {
00763             // Handle Interface Stuff
00764             //RenderTacticalInterface( );
00765       }
00766 
00767       #ifdef NETWORKED
00768       // DEF:  Test Code
00769       PrintNetworkInfo();
00770       #endif
00771 
00772       // Render Interface
00773       RenderTopmostTacticalInterface( );
00774 
00775 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00776       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV )
00777       {
00778             SetFont( MILITARYFONT1 );
00779             SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00780             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTGREEN );       
00781 
00782             mprintf( 0, 0, L"IN CONVERSATION %d", giNPCReferenceCount );
00783             gprintfdirty( 0, 0, L"IN CONVERSATION %d", giNPCReferenceCount );
00784       }
00785 
00786 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00787 
00788       if ( GamePaused() == TRUE )
00789       {
00790             SetFont( MILITARYFONT1 );
00791             SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00792             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTGREEN );       
00793 
00794             mprintf( 0, 10, L"Game Clock Paused" );
00795             gprintfdirty( 0, 10, L"Game Clock Paused" );
00796       }
00797 
00798 #endif
00799 
00800 
00801 
00802       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SHOW_ALL_MERCS )
00803       {
00804             INT32 iSchedules;
00805             SCHEDULENODE *curr;
00806 
00807             SetFont( MILITARYFONT1 );
00808             SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00809             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTGREEN );       
00810 
00811             mprintf( 0, 15, L"Attacker Busy Count: %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount );
00812             gprintfdirty( 0, 15, L"Attacker Busy Count: %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount );
00813 
00814             curr = gpScheduleList;
00815             iSchedules = 0;
00816             while( curr )
00817             {
00818                   iSchedules++;
00819                   curr = curr->next;
00820             }
00821 
00822             mprintf( 0, 25, L"Schedules: %d", iSchedules );
00823             gprintfdirty( 0, 25, L"Schedules: %d", iSchedules );
00824       }
00825 #endif
00826   
00827   
00828       // Render view window
00829       RenderRadarScreen( );
00830     
00831       ResetInterface( );
00832 
00833       if ( gfScrollPending  )
00834       {
00835             AllocateVideoOverlaysArea( );
00836             SaveVideoOverlaysArea( FRAME_BUFFER );
00837             ExecuteVideoOverlays( );
00838       }
00839       else
00840       {
00841             ExecuteVideoOverlays( );
00842       }
00843 
00844       // Adding/deleting of video overlays needs to be done below
00845       // ExecuteVideoOverlays( )....
00846 
00847       // Handle dialogue queue system
00848       if ( !ARE_IN_FADE_IN( ) )
00849       {
00850             if ( gfPlayAttnAfterMapLoad )
00851             {
00852                   gfPlayAttnAfterMapLoad = FALSE;
00853 
00854                   if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
00855                   {
00856                         if( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MUTE_CONFIRMATIONS ] )
00857                               DoMercBattleSound( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ], BATTLE_SOUND_ATTN1 );
00858                   }
00859             }
00860 
00861             HandleDialogue( );
00862       }
00863 
00864       //Don't render if we have a scroll pending!
00865       if ( !gfScrollPending && !gfScrollInertia && !gfRenderFullThisFrame )
00866       {
00867             RenderButtonsFastHelp( );
00868       }
00869 
00870       // Display Framerate
00871       DisplayFrameRate( );
00872 
00873       CheckForMeanwhileOKStart( );
00874 
00875   ScrollString( );
00876   
00877       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue( );
00878 
00879       //KillBackgroundRects( );
00880 
00881       /////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00882       EndFrameBufferRender( );
00883 
00884 
00885       if ( HandleFadeInCallback( ) )
00886       {
00887             // Re-render the scene!
00888             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00889             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
00890       }
00891 
00892       if ( HandleBeginFadeIn( GAME_SCREEN ) )
00893       {
00894             guiTacticalLeaveScreenID = FADE_SCREEN;
00895       }
00896 
00897       if ( guiTacticalLeaveScreen )
00898       {
00899             guiTacticalLeaveScreen        = FALSE;
00900             
00901             InternalLeaveTacticalScreen( guiTacticalLeaveScreenID );
00902       }
00903 
00904       // Check if we are to enter map screen
00905       if ( gfEnteringMapScreen == 2 )
00906       {
00907             gfEnteringMapScreen = FALSE;
00908             EnterMapScreen( );
00909       }
00910 
00911 
00912       // Are we entering map screen? if so, wait a frame!
00913       if ( gfEnteringMapScreen > 0 )
00914       {
00915             gfEnteringMapScreen++;
00916       }     
00917       
00918  return( GAME_SCREEN );
00919 
00920 }

00929 void DisableFPSOverlay( BOOLEAN fEnable )
00930 {
00931 
00932       VIDEO_OVERLAY_DESC            VideoOverlayDesc;
00933 
00934       memset( &VideoOverlayDesc, 0, sizeof( VideoOverlayDesc ) );
00935 
00936 
00937       VideoOverlayDesc.fDisabled    = fEnable;
00938       VideoOverlayDesc.uiFlags    = VOVERLAY_DESC_DISABLED;
00939 
00940       UpdateVideoOverlay( &VideoOverlayDesc, giFPSOverlay, FALSE );
00941       UpdateVideoOverlay( &VideoOverlayDesc, giCounterPeriodOverlay, FALSE );
00942 
00943 }

00945 
00946 void TacticalScreenLocateToSoldier( )
00947 {
00948       INT32                         cnt;
00949       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
00950       INT16                         bLastTeamID;
00951       BOOLEAN                       fPreferedGuyUsed = FALSE;
00952 
00953       if ( gubPreferredInitialSelectedGuy != NOBODY )
00954       {
00955             // ATE: Put condition here...
00956             if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( MercPtrs[ gubPreferredInitialSelectedGuy ] ) && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( MercPtrs[ gubPreferredInitialSelectedGuy ] ) )
00957             {
00958                   LocateSoldier( gubPreferredInitialSelectedGuy, 10 );
00959                   SelectSoldier( gubPreferredInitialSelectedGuy, FALSE, TRUE );
00960                   fPreferedGuyUsed = TRUE;
00961             }
00962             gubPreferredInitialSelectedGuy = NOBODY;
00963       }
00964 
00965       if ( !fPreferedGuyUsed )
00966       {
00967             // Set locator to first merc
00968             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00969             bLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
00970             for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= bLastTeamID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00971             {     
00972                   if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pSoldier ) && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pSoldier ) )
00973                   {
00974                         LocateSoldier( pSoldier->ubID, 10 );
00975                         SelectSoldier( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE, TRUE );
00976                         break;
00977                   }
00978             }
00979       }
00980 }
00981

00983 {
00984       // ATE: These flags well get set later on in mapscreen....
00985       //SetTacticalInterfaceFlags( INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN );
00986       //fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
00987       LeaveTacticalScreen( MAP_SCREEN );
00988 }

00991 void UpdateTeamPanelAssignments( )
00992 {
00993       INT32                         cnt;
00994       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
00995       INT16                         bLastTeamID;
00996 
00997       // Remove all players
00998       RemoveAllPlayersFromSlot( );
00999 
01000       // Set locator to first merc
01001       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
01002       bLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
01003   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= bLastTeamID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
01004       {     
01005             // Setup team interface
01006             CheckForAndAddMercToTeamPanel( pSoldier );
01007       }
01008 
01009 }

01011 
01012 void EnterModalTactical( INT8 bMode )
01013 {
01014       gbTacticalDisableMode = bMode;
01015       gfTacticalIsModal             = TRUE;
01016 
01017       if ( gbTacticalDisableMode == TACTICAL_MODAL_NOMOUSE )
01018       {
01019             if ( !gfTacticalDisableRegionActive )
01020             {
01021                   gfTacticalDisableRegionActive = TRUE;
01022 
01023                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTacticalDisableRegion, 0, 0 ,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
01024                                                  VIDEO_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
01025                   // Add region
01026                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gTacticalDisableRegion );
01027             }
01028       }
01029 
01030       UpdateSaveBuffer();
01031 
01032 }
01033 
01034 void EndModalTactical( )
01035 {
01036       if ( gfTacticalDisableRegionActive )
01037       {     
01038             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTacticalDisableRegion );
01039 
01040             gfTacticalDisableRegionActive = FALSE;
01041       }     
01042 
01043 
01044       if ( gModalDoneCallback != NULL )
01045       {
01046             gModalDoneCallback( );
01047 
01048             gModalDoneCallback = NULL;
01049       }
01050 
01051       gfTacticalIsModal = FALSE;
01052 
01053   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01054 }
01055 
01056 
01057 void HandleModalTactical( )
01058 {
01059       StartFrameBufferRender( );
01060 
01061       RestoreBackgroundRects();
01062 
01063       
01064   RenderWorld( );
01065       RenderRadarScreen( );
01066       ExecuteVideoOverlays( );
01067 
01068       // Handle dialogue queue system
01069       HandleDialogue( );
01070 
01071       HandleTalkingAutoFaces( );
01072 
01073       // Handle faces
01074       HandleAutoFaces( );
01075 
01076       if ( gfInSectorExitMenu )
01077       {
01078             RenderSectorExitMenu( );
01079       }
01080       RenderButtons();
01081 
01082       SaveBackgroundRects( );
01083       RenderButtonsFastHelp( );
01084       RenderPausedGameBox( );
01085 
01086       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue( );
01087       EndFrameBufferRender( );
01088 
01089 }

01092 void InitHelicopterEntranceByMercs( void )
01093 {
01094       if( DidGameJustStart() )
01095       {
01096             AIR_RAID_DEFINITION     AirRaidDef;
01097 
01098             // Update clock ahead from STARTING_TIME to make mercs arrive!
01099             WarpGameTime( FIRST_ARRIVAL_DELAY, WARPTIME_PROCESS_EVENTS_NORMALLY );
01100 
01101             AirRaidDef.sSectorX           = 9;
01102             AirRaidDef.sSectorY           = 1;
01103             AirRaidDef.sSectorZ           = 0;
01104             AirRaidDef.bIntensity = 2;
01105             AirRaidDef.uiFlags            =     AIR_RAID_BEGINNING_GAME;
01106             AirRaidDef.ubNumMinsFromCurrentTime = Random(5) + 1;
01107 
01108             // Madd - nevermind initial air strike.  It just seems silly, since Deidranna doesn't know the mercs are there.
01109             //if ( gGameOptions.fAirStrikes )
01110             //    ScheduleAirRaid( &AirRaidDef );
01111 
01112             gfTacticalDoHeliRun = TRUE;
01113             gfFirstHeliRun                = TRUE;
01114 
01115             gTacticalStatus.fDidGameJustStart = FALSE;
01116       }
01117 }
